title: Request Foods, Inc. Recalls Chicken With Cheese Burrito Products Due to Misbranding and Undeclared Allergens
summary: WASHINGTON, April 20, 2017 Request Foods, Inc., a Holland, Mich. establishment, is recalling approximately 30,537 pounds of burrito products due to misbranding and undeclared allergens, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. The products are mislabeled as a chicken...

establishment.name: Request Foods Inc.
establishment.address:
3460 John F. Donnelly Drive 
  Holland, MI 49424

impacted_products: 6 oz. plastic package containing “ATKINS CHICKEN WITH CHEESE AND BEAN BURRITO” with a “Best By” date of Dec. 19, 2017.
